title: Spears
content: Spears in Baldur's Gate 3 are pieces of equipment that is used to inflict damage against hostile characters such as Enemies and Bosses. Spears are Versatile Martial Weapons in BG3 that can be one-handed or two-handed, dealing 1-6 Damage when one-handed and 1-8 damage when two-handed, the exception being the Pitchfork that can only be Two-Handed and deals 1-6 damage instead. Spears can additionally be Thrown, dealing the same damage they would when used for a melee attack. They have a melee range
